name: Donna Leishman
biography:
Donna Leishman is pursuing a PhD in interactive storytelling at the Glasgow
School of Art. Donna has been an Emmy award nominee for her work on the
Rosie OÂ¹Donnell Show with Bullseyeart.com and her darkly romantic Little Red
Ridinghood work has been widely acclaimed. Her animations have been credited
in the New York Times and the Guardian Online.
